name: @sysos/sysos
description: Web based operating system for SysOps, DevOps, NetOps, SecOps... Monitor, manage, configure, backup & recovery your virtual and physical infrastructure.
author: Isart Navarro <contact@isartnavarro.io> (https://isartnavarro.io)

scripts.build: npm-run-all clean lint-backend lint-frontend build-backend build-libs build-apps build-modals build-frontend copy-extra copy-apps
scripts.build-libs: ng build sysos-lib-logger && ng build sysos-lib-file-system && ng build sysos-lib-application && ng build sysos-lib-modal && ng build sysos-lib-netapp && ng build sysos-lib-selectable && ng build sysos-lib-types && ng build sysos-lib-user && ng build sysos-lib-vmware && ng build sysos-lib-file-system-ui && ng build sysos-lib-file && ng build sysos-lib-folder && ng build sysos-lib-service-injector && ng build sysos-lib-scroll-spy && ng build sysos-lib-sanitize && ng build sysos-lib-ext-mxgraph && ng build sysos-lib-ext-jquery && ng build sysos-lib-ext-dygraphs && ng build sysos-lib-ext-easypiechart && ng build sysos-lib-ext-gaugejs && ng build sysos-lib-ext-perfectscrollbar && ng build sysos-lib-ext-pako && ng build sysos-lib-ext-lz-string
scripts.build-apps: ng build sysos-app-credentials-manager && ng build sysos-app-file-explorer && ng build sysos-app-drawer && ng build sysos-app-infrastructure-manager && ng build sysos-app-backups-manager && ng build sysos-app-datastore-explorer && ng build sysos-app-notepad && ng build sysos-app-sftp && ng build sysos-app-ssh && ng build sysos-app-monitor && ng build sysos-app-wmks
scripts.build-modals: ng build sysos-modal-input && ng build sysos-modal-plain && ng build sysos-modal-question && ng build sysos-modal-esxi-selectable && ng build sysos-modal-recovery-wizard && ng build sysos-modal-backup-wizard && ng build sysos-modal-monitor-options && ng build sysos-modal-monitor-alarms && ng build sysos-modal-monitor-import && ng build sysos-modal-monitor-export && ng build sysos-modal-monitor-xss && ng build sysos-modal-monitor-help
scripts.copy-extra: cp -rf src/backend/app/ssl dist/SysOS/ && cp -rf src/backend/app/filesystem dist/SysOS/ && cp -rf node_modules/draw.io/drawio/src/main/webapp/resources dist/SysOS/filesystem/etc/applications/drawer && cp -rf node_modules/draw.io/drawio/src/main/webapp/stencils/* dist/SysOS/filesystem/etc/applications/drawer/stencils/ && cp -rf node_modules/draw.io/drawio/src/main/webapp/templates dist/SysOS/filesystem/etc/applications/drawer && cp -rf node_modules/draw.io/drawio/src/main/webapp/images dist/SysOS/filesystem/etc/applications/drawer && cp -rf node_modules/draw.io/drawio/src/main/webapp/shapes dist/SysOS/filesystem/etc/applications/drawer
scripts.copy-apps: cp dist/applications/*/bundles/* dist/SysOS/filesystem/bin/applications/ && cp dist/modals/*/bundles/* dist/SysOS/filesystem/bin/modals/ && cp dist/libs/sysos-lib-ext-*/bundles/* dist/SysOS/filesystem/bin/libs/ && npm run postscript
